item.title: Getting started with Google Test
item.description: After some time working with C# and taking advantage of the variety of fantastic unit testing and mocking tools available within Microsoft’s playground, when I returned to using C++ I really wanted to ensure that the unit testing experience was – as far as possible – as convenient and powerful. Unit testing can be a little dry at times (what!? you mean you don’t get a rush from each incremental increase in the automated verifiability of correctness and modularity of your code?
